content: NPU Knockout dies (1/2 to 4”) Knockout dies for punching ½ - 4” diameter conduit holes in up to 10-gauge steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Knockout tool inserts ### FEATURES:Features Improve punching accuracy and productivity – alignment markings help you position the hole precisely Clean-cut holes – engineered to deliver a clean edge when used with Hilti cordless knockout punch tools, punches, and draw studs Wide diameter range – combine with punch and draw stud versions to punch ½” up to 4” diameter conduit holes Applications Punching conduit holes in mild steel up to 10 gauge Punching conduit holes in stainless steel up to 12 gauge ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2196409 - Knockout die NPU D 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Punching NPU D 1 Die - 2196410 - Knockout die NPU D 1-1/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Punching NPU D 1-1/4 Die - 2196403 - Knockout die NPU D 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU D 1/2 Die - 2196411 - Knockout die NPU D 1-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Punching NPU D 1-1/2 Die - 2196412 - Knockout die NPU D 2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Punching NPU D 2 Die - 2355620 - Knockout die NPU D 3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU D 3 Knockout die - 2196408 - Knockout die NPU D 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Punching NPU D 3/4 Die - 2355268 - Knockout die NPU D 4 - Package Size 1 pc
